languages.text: "На замену казненному мастеру Прасу был назначен хормейстер, ранее служивший на мире Чорда. Практически оставшись без астропатической связи, эта планета оказалась в уязвимом положении и вскорости понесла значительные потери. Таковое решение Вольного Торговца повлекло за собой конфликты с протекторатом Чорда".

"The replacement Choirmaster appointed in the wake of Master Pras's execution was taken from a Chorda world where he was serving at the time. That left the planet with effectively no Astropathic communication, putting it in a precarious position that soon resulted in significant losses. The Rogue Trader's decision sparked a series of conflicts with the Chorda protectorate."
languages.original_text: "На замену казненному мастеру Прасу был назначен хормейстер, ранее служивший на мире Чорда. Практически оставшись без астропатической связи, эта планета оказалась в уязвимом положении и вскорости понесла значительные потери. Таковое решение Вольного Торговца повлекло за собой конфликты с протекторатом Чорда".

languages.text: "Der nach der Hinrichtung von Meister Pras ernannte Ersatz-Chormeister stammte von einer Chorda-Welt, wo er zum nämlichen Zeitpunkt seinen Dienst verrichtete. Der Planet hatte deshalb praktisch keine astropathische Kommunikation, was ihn in eine gefährliche Lage brachte, die schon bald zu beträchtlichen Verlusten führte. Die Entscheidung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hatte eine Reihe von Konflikten mit dem Chorda-Protektorat zur Folge."
languages.original_text: "The replacement Choirmaster appointed in the wake of Master Pras's execution was taken from a Chorda world where he was serving at the time. That left the planet with effectively no Astropathic communication, putting it in a precarious position that soon resulted in significant losses. The Rogue Trader's decision sparked a series of conflicts with the Chorda protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Der nach der Hinrichtung von Meister Pras ernannte Ersatz-Chormeister stammte von einer Chorda-Welt, wo er zum nämlichen Zeitpunkt seinen Dienst verrichtete. Der Planet hatte deshalb praktisch keine astropathische Kommunikation, was ihn in eine gefährliche Lage brachte, die schon bald zu beträchtlichen Verlusten führte. Die Entscheidung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hatte eine Reihe von Konflikten mit dem Chorda-Protektorat zur Folge."

languages.text: « Le nouveau maître de chœur nommé suite à l'exécution de maître Pras a été recruté sur l'un des mondes de Chorda, où il officiait. La planète a été privée de communication astropathique, la plaçant dans une position de vulnérabilité et entraînant de nombreuses pertes. La décision {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} a déclenché une série de conflits dans le protectorat de Chorda. »
languages.original_text: "The replacement Choirmaster appointed in the wake of Master Pras's execution was taken from a Chorda world where he was serving at the time. That left the planet with effectively no Astropathic communication, putting it in a precarious position that soon resulted in significant losses. The Rogue Trader's decision sparked a series of conflicts with the Chorda protectorate."

traits.locale_text: « Le nouveau maître de chœur nommé suite à l'exécution de maître Pras a été recruté sur l'un des mondes de Chorda, où il officiait. La planète a été privée de communication astropathique, la plaçant dans une position de vulnérabilité et entraînant de nombreuses pertes. La décision {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} a déclenché une série de conflits dans le protectorat de Chorda. »

languages.text: “普拉斯大师遭到处决之后，新任唱诗大师继任。这位唱诗大师来自库尔达名下的某个世界。由于他的离开，原本的世界几乎彻底失去了星语通信手段。整个世界因此陷入了不稳定状态，很快蒙受了巨大损失。行商浪人的这个决定，导致两个王朝之间爆发了一系列冲突。”
languages.original_text: "The replacement Choirmaster appointed in the wake of Master Pras's execution was taken from a Chorda world where he was serving at the time. That left the planet with effectively no Astropathic communication, putting it in a precarious position that soon resulted in significant losses. The Rogue Trader's decision sparked a series of conflicts with the Chorda protectorate."

traits.locale_text: “普拉斯大师遭到处决之后，新任唱诗大师继任。这位唱诗大师来自库尔达名下的某个世界。由于他的离开，原本的世界几乎彻底失去了星语通信手段。整个世界因此陷入了不稳定状态，很快蒙受了巨大损失。行商浪人的这个决定，导致两个王朝之间爆发了一系列冲突。”

languages.text: «El maestro del Coro nombrado tras la ejecución del maestro Pras se tomó de un mundo de Chorda, donde servía en ese momento. Como consecuencia, el planeta perdió toda comunicación astropática a efectos prácticos, lo que lo dejó en una posición precaria que resultó en pérdidas significativas. La decisión de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente causó una serie de conflictos con el protectorado Chorda».
languages.original_text: "The replacement Choirmaster appointed in the wake of Master Pras's execution was taken from a Chorda world where he was serving at the time. That left the planet with effectively no Astropathic communication, putting it in a precarious position that soon resulted in significant losses. The Rogue Trader's decision sparked a series of conflicts with the Chorda protectorate."

traits.locale_text: «El maestro del Coro nombrado tras la ejecución del maestro Pras se tomó de un mundo de Chorda, donde servía en ese momento. Como consecuencia, el planeta perdió toda comunicación astropática a efectos prácticos, lo que lo dejó en una posición precaria que resultó en pérdidas significativas. La decisión de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente causó una serie de conflictos con el protectorado Chorda».

languages.text: 「マスター・プラスの処刑後に任命された後任のクワイアーマスターは、当時勤務していた惑星チョーダの出身でした。そのため、当該惑星は事実上感応通信が途絶え、非常に危険な状況に置かれ、やがて大きな損失を被ることになりました。ローグトレーダーの決断は、チョーダ保護領との一連の紛争を引き起こしました」
languages.original_text: "The replacement Choirmaster appointed in the wake of Master Pras's execution was taken from a Chorda world where he was serving at the time. That left the planet with effectively no Astropathic communication, putting it in a precarious position that soon resulted in significant losses. The Rogue Trader's decision sparked a series of conflicts with the Chorda protectorate."

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・プラスの処刑後に任命された後任のクワイアーマスターは、当時勤務していた惑星チョーダの出身でした。そのため、当該惑星は事実上感応通信が途絶え、非常に危険な状況に置かれ、やがて大きな損失を被ることになりました。ローグトレーダーの決断は、チョーダ保護領との一連の紛争を引き起こしました」

languages.text: "Üstat Pras'ın idamından sonra atanan yeni Koro Şefi, görev yaptığı Chorda dünyasından getirildi. Bu da söz konusu gezegeni fiilen Astropatik iletişimden yoksun bıraktı, gezegen kısa süre içinde kırılganlaştı ve ciddi kayıplar yaşandı. Hür Tacir'in bu kararı, Chorda protektorasıyla bir dizi çatışmaya yol açtı."
languages.original_text: "The replacement Choirmaster appointed in the wake of Master Pras's execution was taken from a Chorda world where he was serving at the time. That left the planet with effectively no Astropathic communication, putting it in a precarious position that soon resulted in significant losses. The Rogue Trader's decision sparked a series of conflicts with the Chorda protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Üstat Pras'ın idamından sonra atanan yeni Koro Şefi, görev yaptığı Chorda dünyasından getirildi. Bu da söz konusu gezegeni fiilen Astropatik iletişimden yoksun bıraktı; gezegen kısa süre içinde kırılganlaştı ve ciddi kayıplar yaşandı. Hür Tacir'in bu kararı, Chorda protektorasıyla bir dizi çatışmaya yol açtı."
